title: Create C4 Architecture Diagrams
Create C4 Architecture Diagrams
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(c4r)   # demos <- c4_demo() # demos$context # View context diagram # demos$container # View container diagram # demos$component # View component diagram

what: Create a component element for C4 diagrams — c4_component
title: Create a component element for C4 diagrams — c4_component
Create a component element for C4 diagrams — c4_component
Create a component element for C4 diagrams — c4_component
text: id Unique identifier component label Display label component description Optional description component technology Optional technology information

title: Create a component element for C4 diagrams — c4_component
Create a component element for C4 diagrams — c4_component
code: controller <- c4_component(   "controller", "User Controller",   "Handles user requests", "Spring Boot" )

what: Create a C4 Component Diagram — c4_component_diagram
title: Create a C4 Component Diagram — c4_component_diagram
Create a C4 Component Diagram — c4_component_diagram
code: c4_component_diagram(   title = "Component Diagram",   component = list(),   external_system = list(),   relationships = list(),   theme = "default" )

title: Create a C4 Component Diagram — c4_component_diagram
text: title Character string diagram title component List component elements external_system List external system elements relationships List relationships elements theme Character string color theme

title: Create a C4 Component Diagram — c4_component_diagram

title: Create a C4 Container Diagram — c4_container_diagram

what: Create a C4 System Context Diagram — c4_context
title: Create a C4 System Context Diagram — c4_context
Create a C4 System Context Diagram — c4_context
code: c4_context(   title = "System Context",   person = list(),   system = list(),   external_system = list(),   relationships = list(),   theme = "default" )

title: Create a C4 System Context Diagram — c4_context
text: title Character string diagram title person List person elements system List system elements external_system List external system elements relationships List relationships elements theme Character string color theme ("default", "dark", "blue")

title: Create a C4 System Context Diagram — c4_context
Create a C4 System Context Diagram — c4_context
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Create a simple system context diagram c4_context(   title = "E-Commerce System Context",   person = list(     list(id = "customer", label = "Customer", description = "Shops online")   ),   system = list(     list(       id = "ecommerce", label = "E-Commerce System",       description = "Allows customers to buy products online"     )   ),   relationships = list(     list(from = "customer", to = "ecommerce", label = "Uses")   ) ) } # }

what: c4r: Create C4 Architecture Diagrams — c4r-package
title: c4r: Create C4 Architecture Diagrams — c4r-package
text: Provides functions create C4 architecture diagrams (Context, Container, Component, Code diagrams) using simple R interface. package generates diagrams DOT notation can rendered using DiagrammeR Graphviz-compatible tools.

title: c4r: Create C4 Architecture Diagrams — c4r-package

c4r (development version)
text: Added core C4 diagram creation functions: c4_person(), c4_system(), c4_container(), c4_component() element creation c4_external_system() external system elements c4_rel() relationships elements c4_context(), c4_container_diagram(), c4_component_diagram() complete diagrams Included multiple themes: default, dark, blue Added comprehensive input validation error handling Initial CRAN submission.
